code: import React from'react';import'./About.css';import prithvi from'./prithvirajChavan.jpg';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";var about=function about(props){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{class:"aboutWrapper",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"contactInfo",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Contact No.: 9665007082"},'1'),",",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Mail Id.: contact.prithvirajchavan@gmail.com"},'2')]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"about",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"description",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"I am Prithviraj."}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Currently based in Pune, India."}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"I primarily shoot Fashion and Portraiture but also find myself exploring and indulging in places and experiences around the world when travelling for work or leisure."}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"With photography diplomas from MIT School Of Photography and Bharti Vidyapeeth\u2019s School of Photography, I started my journey in photography in 2015."}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Taking inspiration from photographers like Prabuddha Dasgupta, Richard Avedon, Irving Penn, Gregory Crewdson, I often find their art pushing me to work harder towards my craft. "}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Photography for me is about creating thought provoking pictures and trying to get the best out of people."}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"There is no better feeling than creating a visual that excites me and allows memories to be made in the process of it."})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{className:"author",src:prithvi,alt:"Prithviraj"})]})]});};export default about;
